title: does pes do a refund on the admission fees for ba llb?
content: i’ve already paid the admission fees for ba llb but is there a way for me to get a refund on it? i paid not too long ago

comments.body: Yes the fees paid is refunded back after a few comparatively minor deductions if a student plans to withdraw seat before the semesters start(don't know the exact duration)
okay tysm. i did email and message them but i didn’t get a reply that’s why i asked on here
